articles.title: Kim Jong Un Calls upon Children of Revolutionary Martyrs to Become Reliable Backbone of Songun Revolution
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Calls upon Children of Revolutionary Martyrs to Become Reliable Backbone of Songun Revolution
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un on Friday sent a letter "Children of Revolutionary Martyrs Should Become Dependable Backbone of Songun Revolution That Gives Steady Continuity to Bloodline of Mangyongdae, Bloodline of Mt. Paektu" to the teachers and students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School on the occasion of their 65th anniversary.
					 The letter was conveyed to the participants in the meeting held to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the schools that day.
					
					 In the letter he said the schools are Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il revolutionary schools which were founded and developed under the care of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and are bases for training backbone of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Referring to the undying leadership feats of the great persons of Mt. Paektu associated with the schools, he said the schools have trained large forces playing a core and pivotal role in the sacred struggle for defending the country and achieving the prosperity of the country over the past 65 years.
					
					 Noting that the schools have very important responsibilities and duties to fulfill, he indicated basic duties, tasks and ways.
					
					 The basic duty is to firmly prepare all the students to be the pillars and backbone forces of the Songun revolution who will give steady continuity to the bloodline of Mangyongdae, the bloodline of Mt. Paektu, he noted, and continued:
					
					 It is important to strengthen ideological education of students.
					
					 The schools should tirelessly educate students so that they may continue bringing into bloom the flowers of revolution by following in the footsteps of their parents and thus make sure that they absolutely trust in the party and the leader, protect their high prestige in every way and defend them at the risk of their lives.
					
					 The schools should deepen education in faith and the sense of obligation in various forms and by diverse methods to suit the ages of students and their mental qualities so that they may absolutely trust in and follow only the party and the leader who brought them up and become men and women strong in faith and the sense of obligation who do not abandon the red flag of revolution and the glorious flag of the party to the end though they may lay down their lives.
					
					 It is imperative to effectively conduct education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism so that students may become true patriots of the Songun era who value even a blade of grass and a single tree and tend them with care from their childhood, boundlessly love the country and its people and devote their all to the prosperity of the socialist country and its people's happiness.
					
					 The schools should channel efforts into the education in collectivism and morality and thus prepare all students as genuine revolutionaries and human beings of conscience who think of their organization and collective before anything else, ready to sacrifice themselves for their organization and collective and personify beautiful morality and ethics in the era of Songun.
					
					 They should direct efforts to education to prepare students as revolutionary talents possessed of a high level of scientific and technological knowledge.
					
					 It is important to further strengthen the education in basic science including mathematics.
					
					 The schools should pay special attention to intensifying computer education.
					
					 It is necessary to channel efforts into the education in foreign languages so as to help students master at least one foreign language and speak foreign languages fluently. 
					
					It is imperative to exert great efforts for education to help students acquire basic military knowledge to suit the mission as the centers for training reserve cadres of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It is necessary to strengthen the education in arts and sports.
					
					 It is important to spruce up research rooms for subjects and drill grounds as required by the times, the purposes of education at the  schools and characteristic features of students at different ages and make the existing material and technological foundation for education pay off in practice.
					
					 In order to bring about a fundamental change in education it is necessary to further raise the responsibility and role of the teachers of the schools.
					
					 The teachers of the schools should take good care of the students' living as their real parents would do and make them regard schools as their dear old homes and warm cradles. They should become real parents of students before being educators.
					
					 The students of the schools are sons and daughters of the Workers' Party of Korea and my children who share blood with the party.
					
					 The students of the schools should always bear deep in mind the profound trust and care shown by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and make redoubled efforts to become pillars firmly supporting Songun Korea.
					
					 They should study hard, valuing time under the slogan "Let Us Study for Korea!" put up by Kim Jong Il in the period when he was among students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and prepare themselves to be competent revolutionary talents who will play a big role in the struggle to translate the desire of the Generalissimos into reality.
					
					 The graduates from the schools should become core forces and play the role of pioneers in giving steady continuity to the bloodline of Mangyongdae, the bloodline of Mt. Paektu as befitting the sons and daughters of Mangyongdae and Mt. Paektu who grew up under the care of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They should play a pivotal role in upholding the Songun revolutionary leadership of the party at their posts.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed firm belief that the schools will successfully train the sons and daughters of Mangyongdae as reliable backbone forces who will shoulder upon themselves the work of the party, state and army as required by the idea and intention of the party and that all children of revolutionary martyrs will become vanguard fighters remaining true to the Songun leadership of the party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Refers to History of Revolutionary Schools
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Refers to History of Revolutionary Schools 
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un in his work "Children of Revolutionary Martyrs Should Become Dependable Backbone of Songun Revolution That Gives Steady Continuity to Bloodline of Mangyongdae, Bloodline of Mt. Paektu" referred to the fact that the revolutionary schools were founded and developed under the care of the great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					 Noting that the schools are Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il revolutionary schools which were founded and developed under the care of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and are bases for training backbone of the Songun revolution, he went on:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung saw to it that the revolutionary school was built in time-honored Mangyongdae to train children of martyrs who laid down their lives for the revolution though he had a mountain of work to do for building new Korea in the liberated country. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung made up his mind to build the revolutionary school in the difficult period right after the liberation of the country when he had nothing but an empty knapsack he brought from Mt. Paektu. This courageous decision could be made only by the President, who had the noblest revolutionary sense of obligation and warmest love for the younger generation as his natural disposition. 
					
					 The President made sure that children of revolutionary martyrs who had been wandering with no one to support them were brought together with much effort and brought up in the cradles of loving care called revolutionary schools. Since that period till the last moments of his great life the President showed loving care for the children. 
					
					 Anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk was a tender-hearted mother who took deep care of the children of the schools as their real mothers would do. She was a great teacher who led the children with great care so that they might grow up to be successors to the revolution. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un recalled that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, when he was among children of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School in his childhood, implanted such mainstay of faith as trusting in and following the President only into their minds. 
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il spared nothing to build the revolutionary schools into the centers for training the backbone forces of the Korean revolution and warm cradles for their children, Kim Jong Un noted, stressing: 
					
					 It was thanks to the profound care of Kim Jong Il that the revolutionary schools were always bright with lights even during the Arduous March and the students there could stoutly grow up to be able workers of the revolution who would shoulder upon themselves the future of the country, while studying hard and cheerfully playing with nothing to desire more in the world.

Kim Jong Un Clarifies Responsibilities, Duties of Revolutionary Schools

					 He called for directing efforts to education to prepare students as revolutionary talents possessed of a high level of scientific and technological knowledge. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School should raise the quality of education in economic subjects and bring up all students to be women revolutionaries of Songun era and true daughters of the party who can successfully perform the core role in the drive for building a great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School should exert great efforts for education to help students acquire basic military knowledge to suit the mission as the centers for training reserve cadres of the Korean People's Army.

Paektu as befitting the sons and daughters of Mangyongdae and Mt. Paektu who grew up under the care of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Joint Celebration of Anniversary of Revolutionary Schools Held
articles.content:
Joint Celebration of Anniversary of Revolutionary Schools Held 
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A joint celebration themed "Let us steadfastly carry forward the bloodline of Mangyongdae, the bloodline of Mt. Paektu, by devotedly defending the leader" took place at the April 25 House of Culture Saturday to mark the 65th anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School. 
					 Present there were teachers, students and graduates of the schools. 
					
					 The event began with narration and chorus "Song of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School" presented by students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School. 
					
					 Graduates from the school recollected the profound loving care Generalissimo Kim Il Sung showed for children of revolutionary martyrs. They recalled that he took warm care of those children at the opening ceremony of the school. 
					
					 They looked back on the days when they were growing up, given an ample opportunity of learning under the care of Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk after receiving school uniforms and things with their great loving care. 
					
					 Referring to the fact that leader Kim Jong Il led students so that they might glorify the tradition of devotedly defending the leader in every annul of the rigorous revolution, they said that he visited the school on the morning of the New Year 1997, showing profound loving care for them. 
					
					 There were more speakers who recounted the story about the loving care shown by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un while visiting the school in January this year. And the children who had the honor of meeting the Marshal that day were pleased to tell about his love. 
					
					 Then some graduates from the schools took the floor. 
					
					 Among them were commanding officers of the Korean People's Army from forefront units and others who are performing labor feats in different fields for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Students and graduates mounted the stage to renew their determination to successfully perform their roles at their revolutionary posts, being well aware that they are the successors to the revolution who were brought up learning at Kim Il Sung and    Kim Jong Il Revolutionary School.

articles.title: New Book Published to Mark 65th Anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
New Book Published to Mark 65th Anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School 
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A book "Heirs to Mangyongdae" was brought out in the DPRK to mark the 65th anniversary of the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School. 
					 The book carries nearly 200 works written by officials, teachers and students of the school. They include notes, epics, words of songs, children's songs, children's poems, essays, occasional notes and diaries.
					
					 Epic "Trumpet Note in Mangyongdae", lyric "On the Day of Opening Ceremony of School" and other works tell about the wise guidance and warm loving care shown by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					 They also reflect the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's profound trust and touching loving care shown for the children of the school and their pledge to live up to them with loyalty. 
					
					 Among those are works depicting children growing up to be revolutionaries boundlessly faithful to the party like lifeguards who protected Kim Il Sung at the risk of their lives during the Fatherland Liberation War and the revolutionary soldiers who took the lead in upholding Kim Jong Il during the Arduous March, forced march.

articles.title: Voices of Dependable Pillars of Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Revolutionary School Students Vow to Become Dependable Pillars of Korean Revolution
						
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un on Friday sent a letter "Children of Revolutionary Martyrs Should Become Dependable Backbone of Songun Revolution That Gives Steady Continuity to Bloodline of Mangyongdae, Bloodline of Mt. Paektu" to the teachers and students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School on the occasion of their 65th anniversary.
					In this regard, Pak Un Hyok, a student of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, told KCNA: 
					
					"Such schools for children of the revolutionary martyrs can be found only in our country that shines with the august names of the peerlessly great persons and their feats.
					
					Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent a letter of deep love and trust to us on the 65th birthday of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School.
					
					The great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung saw to it that the revolutionary school was built to train children of revolutionary martyrs though he had a mountain of work to do for building a new Korea in the liberated country.
					
					His strong sense of obligation to the martyrs and love for the posterity remains still now as evidenced by the letter.
					
					We will prepare ourselves to be dependable backbone of the Songun (military-first) revolution, with this great honor and happiness always kept in our mind."
					
					Ri Min Gyong, a student of Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, said:
					
					"All things at the school, including educational facilities and bedrooms, are associated with the ardent love of the great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					In his letter Marshal Kim Jong Un showed his will to take care of our destiny in a responsible manner, true to the noble intention of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					Always cherishing his loving care in my mind, I will reliably inherit the bloodline of Mt. Paektu, the lineage of Mangyongdae.
					
					All the students of the school are hardening their resolve to become vanguard fighters intensely loyal to his Songun leadership."

articles.title: Foreign Guests Fly Back
articles.content:
Visits
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Maurice Cukierman, international secretary of the Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League, and the delegation of Kyodo News of Japan headed by President Satoshi Ishikawa flew back on Saturday. 
					 Meanwhile the delegation of the Gunma Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity led by Co-representative Tsunoda Giichi arrived here by plane.

articles.title: North-South Buddhist Joint Mass Held
articles.content:
North-South Buddhist Joint Mass Held
 Mt. Kumgang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The north-south Buddhist joint mass praying for national reunification was held at the Singye Temple in Mt. Kumgang on Oct. 13 to mark the fifth anniversary of the restoration of the temple.
					 Present there from the north side were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea, priests of the temple and believers and from the south side priests and believers of the Buddhist Jogye Order. 
					
					 A ritual was made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Then a north-south Buddhist joint address praying for national reunification was read out.
					
					 Speakers said that the Singye Temple successfully restored by concerted efforts of Buddhists in the north and the south has failed to play a due role owing to the obstructions of anti-reunification conservatives who dislike the national unity and reunification and the desire of fellow countrymen to visit Mt. Kumgang. 
					
					 They called upon Buddhists in the north and the south to unite in Dharma-minded concord to improve the north-south relations, preserve and implement the north-south joint declarations and thus make the temple Buddhism seminary for national concord guided by teaching of Buddha.
					
					 A joint address expressed the resolution of the Buddhists in the north and the south to turn out as one in the drive to defuse the distrust and confrontation between the north and the south and the danger of war and ensure durable and solid peace along the road indicated by the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Week of DPRK-China Friendship Opens
articles.content:
Week of DPRK-China Friendship Opens
 Dandong, October 12 (KCNA Correspondent) -- A week of DPRK-China friendship opened in Dandong City, China with due ceremony. 
					 During the week there will take place colorful events including goods exhibition, tourism exhibition, fine arts and craftwork exhibition and art performance. 
					
					 The opening ceremony was held in a stadium in Dandong on Friday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were a vice-chairman of the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade, vice-governor of Liaoning Province, officials of the party, government, culture, economy and trade fields of the Province and Dandong City and citizens. Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and foreign diplomatic envoys here also attended. 
					
					 A DPRK delegation to the events headed by Hong Kil Nam, vice-chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, Kim Kwang Hun, DPRK consul-general in Shenyang, and Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, also took part in the ceremony. 
					
					 An opening address was made to be followed by congratulatory speeches. 
					
					 The speakers said that the events of week for DPRK-China friendship will offer another important occasion in the history of the development of the friendly relations in the border city of Dandong linked by the same mountain and rivers with the DPRK. 
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the parties and governments of the two countries to invariably develop the traditional DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations which were provided by the leaders of elder generations and weathered all sorts of ordeals, they stressed.
					
					 They expressed belief that the events will make contributions to strengthening mutual understandings and trust and putting the relations of friendship, cooperation and exchange between the bordering areas of the two countries on a higher stage. 
					
					 A music and dance performance by the Mansudae Art Troupe and a reception were given to mark the opening of the friendship week on the same day.

articles.title: Mansudae Art Troupe Gives Performance in Dandong, China
articles.content:
Mansudae Art Troupe Gives Performance in Dandong, China
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance was given by the Mansudae Art Troupe at a stadium in Dandong on Friday and Saturday to mark the beginning of the week of DPRK-China friendship. 
					 Enjoying the performance were a vice-chairman of the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade, figures of various circles and citizens of Liaoning Province and Dandong City including a vice governor of Liaoning Province, the staff members of Chinese embassy in Pyongyang including its Ambassador Liu Hongcai and diplomatic envoys of various countries to the DPRK.
					
					 Also among the audience were members of the DPRK delegation for the week led by Hong Kil Nam, vice-chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, Kim Kwang Hun, DPRK consul-general in Shenyang and Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					
					 The performance began with the immortal revolutionary paean "Song of General Kim Il Sung".
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as female quintet and chorus "Moran Hill", dance "Azalea of Homeland" and violin ensemble "General Uses Art of Compressing Space".
					
					 The performers successfully represented boundless reverence for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made immortal contributions to the Korean revolution and global independence and forged and steadily developed the DPRK-China friendly ties, as well as the Korean people's ardent patriotism. 
					
					 Also put on the stage were Chinese songs and world famous songs.
					
					 A floral basket was presented to the performers congratulating them on their successful performance.

articles.title: Autumn All-people Movement for Land Management Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Autumn All-people Movement for Land Management Brisk in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- An autumn all-people movement for land management is now under way across the country.
					 Plans for technical improvement of roads, rivers and streams have been carried out at 70-80 percent across the country and the construction and renovation of dwelling houses and public buildings made brisk headway in a short span of time since the kick-off of the movement.
					
					 Kilju and Myonggan counties of North Hamgyong Province restored in a brief span of time several dozen km long sections of roads and a number of bridges destroyed by flood. 
					
					 Successes in the project for the technical improvement of roads were reported from Hochon County of South Hamgyong Province. It restored more than 20 destroyed bridges to their original state. 
					
					 Jongju City and Kwaksan and Taegwan counties of North Phyongan Province face-lifted roads by widening roads, straightening their winds and paving them.
					
					 Hoeryong City of North Hamgyong Province did thousands of square meters of stone work on dykes along rivers and streams to protect a large area of cultivated land.
					
					 Yomju County of North Phyongan Province dredged more than 12 000 cubic meters of mud in Tugok Stream and did at least 7 000 square meters of stone work in the wake of its completion of Maebong Stream project in a matter of five days.
					
					 Sunan District in Pyongyang replaced the roofs of apartment houses in Yokjon-dong and changed their storm sewers, covered thousands of square meters of area with grass, paved 700 square meters of footway with small blocks, repaired over 600 meters of fences and built a zelkova tree nursery.
					
					 Kumya County of South Hamgyong Province and Kumchon County of North Hwanghae Province painted dwelling houses in their county seats. They built fences extending thousands of meters, adjusted ditches and planted flower trees and turf, sprucing up streets and villages.
					
					 Many other cities and counties are pushing forward preparations for production of saplings and autumn tree planting.

articles.title: Pongnam Primary School in Pyongyang Trains Reserve Rhythmic Gymnasts
articles.content:
Pongnam Primary School in Pyongyang Trains Reserve Rhythmic Gymnasts
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Pongnam Primary School is well known in the DPRK as a center for training reserve rhythmic gymnasts.
					 The school placed first at the 38th National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize in May-June this year. In the team and individual rhythmic gymnastics events its pupils won a high acclamation of experts and audience for their unity in movements and display of graceful movements of high technique.
					
					 In the past contests, too, the school proved successful in team and individual events, thus gaining many trophies.
					
					 Ryang Chun Gyong, a teacher of the school who was awarded the titles of People's Teacher and Merited Athlete, told KCNA:
					
					 "Many years have passed since a rhythmic gymnastics group was set up at the school thanks to the government measure for introducing specialization in sports.
					
					 In the period the group bagged 10 odd trophies and more than 800 medals, including 600 odd gold medals, at the annual national schoolchildren's sports contest for Jongilbong Prize.
					
					 Graduates from the school have played a major role in developing the country's rhythmic gymnastics while being active at the national team.
					
					 Some of them became merited athletes or gymnastics stars for their good results at national and international tournaments.
					
					 I'll work harder to train many competent rhythmic gymnasts and thus contribute to turning our country into a sports power."

articles.title: Lee Group's Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Leads to Its Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Lee Group's Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Leads to Its Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea, more dead than alive, is fated to meet a miserable end as he is becoming evermore crazy in his moves to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Saturday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The fate of the Lee group hangs by a thread as it is in the grip of a serious ruling crisis. It is, however, going more reckless in its confrontation ruckus, dreaming a foolish dream. This is the last-ditch efforts of those taken aback by the DPRK's single-minded unity.
					
					 The puppet regime's anachronistic policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen has gone totally bankrupt. To make matters worse, the anti-"government" struggle is gaining momentum in all parts of south Korea and the ceaseless disclosure of scandals committed by those in power have thrown the Lee group into an abyss of ruin and deprived it of any haven.
					
					 The Lee group's fate is just like a falling leaf as it is forsaken by the public and cursed by the whole nation. It is seeking to find a way out of this crisis in doing harm to fellow countrymen and kicking up a row on "security concern". By escalating the confrontation racket the group seeks to bring the situation to an extreme phase of tension in a bid to divert elsewhere the attention of the angry people and prolong its remaining days at any cost.
					
					 The group's efforts to seek a way out in escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen and intensifying the war moves are as senseless and foolish an act as precipitating its own doomsday.
					
					 Confrontation maniacs will not be able to escape the most disgraceful end.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lashes at Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lashes at Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Remarks
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Recently, traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea groundlessly pulled up the DPRK, asserting "north's provocation festered" and "north's nuclear and missile development is intolerable." Some days later, he again cried out for "north's opening", while making stereotyped reckless remarks about "bellicose rival."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This reckless behavior of Lee is a last-ditch effort of a confrontation maniac fated to meet a punishment by history before long.
					
					 He is getting more hysteric in his bad habit of standing against fellow countrymen as the day of his ouster is drawing nearer, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the height of impudence for him to vociferate about "provocation" and "bellicose rival." 
					
					 These days Lee never misses the chance to talk about someone's "opening," trumpeting about the so-called "wind". This is, however, no more than a daydream of a psychopath.
					
					 He had better mind his own serious crisis created by his unpopular rule before ballyhooing about "opening" by someone.
					
					 He should bear in mind that his desperate moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK would only add to his crimes committed against the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan held a meeting at the Korean Center in Bishkek on Wednesday to celebrate the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the WPK's 67th birthday.
					 Chairman Pak Kyong Ho and officials of the confederation and other Koreans were among those present at the meeting.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in an office of the confederation and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The chairman in a speech praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung, the most powerful revolutionary party that achieved the unity of the leader, the party and the popular masses and the most popular party that serves the people.
					
					 Similar meeting took place by Koreans in Uzbekistan on Oct. 9.
					
					 Present there were Jo Yun Hae, chairperson of the Commonwealth of Independent State Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, officials of the Uzbek Association of Elders for Korean Cultural Tradition, heads of various Korean art groups and other Koreans.
					
					 Ju Yong Il, chairman of the association, in a speech praised Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, for having developed the party into a genuine party serving the people and a tested revolutionary party leading the revolution and construction only to victory.
					
					 A performance was given by Korean artistes in Uzbekistan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepalese Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Nepalese Paper
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was carried by the Nepalese newspaper Jana Sata on October 6.
					 The work made public on October 2, 1995 reviews with pride the glorious history of the WPK in which it explored a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and clearly indicates the way of developing the WPK into an eternal party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Bulletin of Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Bulletin of Mexican Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The main contents of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" was carried by a bulletin released by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies that it is a principled requirement for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed in Party Building Lauded by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed in Party Building Lauded by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Oct. 4 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il had wisely led the WPK since he started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK in June 1964. 
					
					  He successfully carried forward and developed the Juche-oriented cause of party building pioneered by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Songun politics was his original political mode.
					
					 The WPK dynamically advanced the Korean revolution by frustrating the imperialists and modern revisionists' all sorts of maneuvers against socialism.
					
					 Great successes have been made in the improvement of the people's living standard and national defence industry under the leadership of the party.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un is making sure that the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il shine forever.
					
					 The 4th WPK conference made a decision to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its eternal general secretary.
					
					 Kim Jong Un clarified that great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the guiding idea of the WPK.
					
					 The exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in party building will last forever.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Marked in Various Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Various events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 67th anniversary of the WPK and the 86th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 They included a meeting, reading session, film shows and book and photo exhibition in Uganda, Poland, Thailand and Switzerland from Oct. 4 to 6.
					
					 Displayed at those events were photos on the immortal leadership exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in party building and the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Displayed in the venues were works of peerlessly great men and books and photos on the glorious history of the WPK.
					
					 Films shown were "Party Founding Memorial Tower" and other Korean films.
					
					 Political and public figures and masses of relevant countries attended those events.
					
					 Staff members of the DPRK embassies there were present on invitation.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Poland and Switzerland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un's Works Studied in India, Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un's Works Studied in India, Peru
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Indian Society for Juche Idea- Self-Reliance Studies and the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism held seminars on the works of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un on Oct. 4 and 5.
					 They were held to mark the 15th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 67th anniversary of the WPK and the 86th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					
					 Present at the seminars were public figures and the masses of the relevant countries.
					
					 Parveen Gupta, secretary general of the Indian society, said in his speech:
					
					 The eternal General Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Il published the work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building". The work is a guiding principle as it wisely clarifies the reason why the socialist ruling parties were collapsed in some countries and gives scientific answers to every issue arising in the construction of a revolutionary party and its activities.
					
					 This guiding principle for building a revolutionary party will encourage the struggle of the revolutionary parties and progressive people across the world for defending and advancing the cause of independence and socialist cause of the popular masses with its everlasting viability.
					
					 Guillermo Alcazar Ribera, chairman of the Peruvian group, and other speakers said the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un made public the work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche". It is a historical work representing his steadfast will to carry forward the idea, cause and leadership of the preceding leaders of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK and its people will gain a final victory in their drive to safeguard Juche-type socialism, build a thriving nation and achieve the national reunification under his leadership, they added.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Laud Party-Building Feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Laud Party-Building Feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Lectures took place in Ecuador, Indonesia and Sweden between Oct. 5 and 8 on the occasions of the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 67th birthday.
					 The president of the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador said that President Kim Il Sung advanced the line of building an independent party based on the Juche idea.
					
					 The President liberated the country from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists and founded the Workers' Party of Korea on Oct. 10, 1945, he noted.
					
					 He said that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il strengthened and developed the WPK into a seasoned and tested invincible party by successfully carrying forward the idea and feats of the President on party-building.
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is leading the WPK only to victory and firmly defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation by carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders, he noted.
					
					 He said that the world progressives are confident that the WPK will surely accomplish the historic cause of building a thriving nation and reunifying the country, shedding its rays for all ages as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's party under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The director of Millennia Armada Express Company of Indonesia spoke highly of the party-building feats of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He stressed that the WPK is greeting its new heyday in developing itself under the seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: British Social Bodies Support October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
British Social Bodies Support October 4 Declaration 
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Oct. 1 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the October 4 Declaration.
					 It said that the adoption of the declaration marked an event of epochal significance in the struggle for independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The October 4 declaration fully embodies the idea of "By our nation itself!" clarified in the June 15 north-south joint declaration, the great programme for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The declaration was adopted thanks to leader Kim Jong Il who was possessed of noblest patriotism.
					
					 Were it not for his Songun policy, the declaration would not have been adopted.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak's puppet regime in south Korea totally negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and blatantly trampled down upon the spirit of the declarations after coming to power.
					
					 It has also resorted to the hostile policy toward the DPRK and the moves to unleash a new war against it.
					
					 Unless the Lee group of puppets is eliminated, it will be impossible to realize the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 We fully support the heroic struggle of all the Koreans for driving the U.S. forces out of south Korea and thoroughly implementing the October 4 declaration by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 We are confident that Korea is sure to be reunified under the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: British Social Bodies Condemn Anti-DPRK Military Provocations by S. Korean Authorities
articles.content:
British Social Bodies Condemn Anti-DPRK Military Provocations by S. Korean Authorities 
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on Sept. 29 in denunciation of the reckless anti-DPRK military provocations of the south Korean authorities.
					 The statement expressed full support for the just stance of the DPRK clarified in the answer of a spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 It denounced the south Korean puppet regime for committing extremely provocative actions at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists in the West Sea of Korea where tensions run high.
					
					 It noted that the south Korean puppet regime should understand well the invincible might of the Korean People's Army having the dear respected Kim Jong Un as its supreme commander.
					
					 It said that the DPRK has matchless military muscle and the KPA can decisively crush any aggressors.
					
					 The DPRK has achieved the invincible single-minded unity and its army and people are fully ready to reunify the country once ordered by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 If the poor south Korean puppet forces insist on the absurd "northern limit line", they will be made to bitterly regret, it said.
					
					 We speak highly of the will of the DPRK to staunchly safeguard Juche-based socialism.

articles.title: Cambodian Mass Media Supports Korean People's Reunification Movement
articles.content:
Cambodian Mass Media Supports Korean People's Reunification Movement 
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Cambodian radios made reports on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the October 4 declaration and the 32nd anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 The Cambodian State Radio on Oct. 3 made a report under the title "Banner of Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity of Korea".
					
					 October 2007 saw the holding of the inter-Korean summit in Pyongyang and the adoption of the "Declaration for the Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity", it said, adding:
					
					 The October 4 declaration serves as a programme for comprehensively implementing the June 15 north-south joint declaration and a banner promoting the co-existence and co-prosperity of the Korean nation and propelling the independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The October 4 declaration calls for independently settling the issue of reunification of the country in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and attaching importance to the dignity and interests of the nation and orientating everything toward them.
					
					 This shows that the declaration is based on the idea of "By our nation itself!" it being a practical reunification programme for developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving the reunification of the country by thoroughly supporting and defending the June 15 joint declaration and on the basis of it.
					
					  (F.M.90.5) Radio made reports on the proposal on Oct. 2 and 4.
					
					 It aired that the proposal calls for reunifying the country in such a way as founding a federal republic through the establishment of a unified national government on the condition that the north and the south of Korea recognize and tolerate each other's ideas and social systems, a government in which the two sides are represented on an equal footing and under which they exercise regional autonomy with equal rights and duties.
					
					 It noted that the proposal is the most just and reasonable reunification one reflecting the specific reality of Korea as well as the desire, wishes and interests of all the Koreans for independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 It added that the international community hoped for the detente of the Korean Peninsula and the realization of the reconciliation, unity and reunification of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Studied and Disseminated in Over 150 Countries and Regions
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Studied and Disseminated in Over 150 Countries and Regions
						
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- It is 20 years since leader Kim Jong Il published the work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building".
					 This work has been widely studied and disseminated in more than 150 countries and regions.
					
					 Foreign countries reported the work and brought it out in booklet.
					
					 Many mass media of over 100 countries reported about the work for two months alone after its publication.
					
					 Among them were People's Daily of China, Russian Paper Patriot, Prensa Latina, Asahi Shimbun, Bulgarian Paper Tribuna and Equatorial Guinean Radio.
					
					 International and regional bodies and foreign political parties and social bodies also carried the work in their magazines and bulletins, and posted it on their Internet homepages.
					
					 They include the International Institute of the Juche Idea, the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy.
					
					 Foreign media covered the work under the headings including "HE Kim Jong Il publishes a thesis clarifying the fundamentals of revolutionary party building", "Review on the historical experience and lesson of party building" and "An appeal to the revolutionary parties to unite against the imperialism".
					
					 Some foreign countries published the work in booklet.
					
					 Among them were Laos, Nepal, Namibia, Mexico, the Czech Republic and Bulgaria.
					
					 Personages of foreign political parties, social bodies and the political and public circles adopted and made public resolutions and statements in support of the work.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin accepted the work and adopted a resolution right after the publication of the work in October 1992.
					
					 There took place in several countries and by regional bodies colorful events on the work such as seminar, lecture and reading session.
					
					 Among them were Pakistan, Bangladesh, Uganda, Ethiopia, Guyana, Jamaica, Denmark and France.
					
					 The work was adopted as a main document at the European regional Juche idea seminar on the times and independence in Europe held in Paris.
					
					 The Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea decided to make the work a must book for the party and let all the party members study it. The Workers' Party of Mexico disseminated the work to all the party members. The party is finding solutions to all issues arising in the party activities in the work.
					
					 More progressive political parties are considering the work as firm guidelines for building their parties.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un publica obra por 65o aniversario de escuelas revolucionarias
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un publica obra por 65o aniversario de escuelas revolucionarias
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el 12 de octubre de 2012 un mensaje a los profesores, empleados y alumnos de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y de la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de las mismas.
					El mensaje titulado "Los hijos de los martires revolucionarios deben ser fidedignos pilares de la revolucion del Songun que continuen firmemente el linaje de Mangyongdae y el del monte Paektu" fue entregado el mismo dia a los participantes en el acto conmemorativo de la citada efemeride.
					
					En su obra, el Mariscal senalo que esas escuelas son las revolucionarias Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, que han sido fundadas y desarrolladas bajo la direccion de estos Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, y las bases de formacion de los pilares de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Se refirio a las inmortales hazanas de direccion de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu registradas en esas escuelas y subrayo que durante los 65 anos pasados, ellas formaron numerosos pilares que desempenan el papel medular y central en la sagrada lucha por la defensa de la patria y la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Indicando que son muy importantes la responsabilidad y la mision de las escuelas revolucionarias, aclaro el deber principal y las tareas de ellas como sigue:
					
					El deber principal es formar a todos los alumnos como pilares de la revolucion del Songun que continuen firmemente el linaje de Mangyongdae y el del monte Paektu.
					
					Hay que intensificar la educacion ideologica sobre los alumnos.
					
					Al educar constantemente a los alumnos para que continuen la revolucion sucediendo a sus padres, hay que hacerles confiar absolutamente en el partido y el lider, salvaguardar en todos los sentidos la gran autoridad de estos y defenderlos a costa de la vida.
					
					Es preciso profundizar de diferentes maneras la educacion sobre la conviccion y obligacion moral conforme a las caracteristicas psicologicas por edades de los alumnos, de modo que todos ellos se hagan los fuertes en la fe y obligacion moral que confien absolutamente en el partido y el lider, que los han criado, y no abandonen hasta el final de su vida la bandera roja de la revolucion y la gloriosa del partido.
					
					Hace falta impartir sustancialmente la educacion de Kimjongilismo para hacer a los alumnos cuidar con mucha devocion cada planta y cada arbol desde la ninez y prepararlos como patriotas verdaderos de la epoca del Songun que amen sin limites la patria y el pueblo y luchen con todo lo suyo por la prosperidad de la patria socialista y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Al concentrar las fuerzas en la educacion de colectivismo y moral, hay que formar a todos los alumnos como revolucionarios de verdad y hombres de conciencia que sepan pensar primero en la organizacion y el colectivo y sacrificarse por estos y encarnen bellas costumbres morales y eticas de la era del Songun.
					
					Es preciso prestar mucha atencion a la formacion de los alumnos como competente personal revolucionario con ricos conocimientos cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					Hay que intensificar la educacion de ciencias basicas como matematica.
					
					Resulta imperioso prestar especial atencion al mejoramiento de la educacion de computacion.
					
					Lo mismo se debe hacer con las asignaturas de lenguas extranjeras para que los alumnos puedan dominar mas de un idioma extranjero, sobre todo, hablarlo fluidamente.
					
					De acuerdo con la mision de las escuelas como bases de formacion de los cuadros de reserva del Ejercito Popular, se debe encauzar mucha fuerza a la educacion para dar a los alumnos los conocimientos militares basicos.
					
					Ha de intensificarse tambien la educacion artistica y la educacion fisica. Tomando en cuenta las demandas de la epoca, la meta de ensenanza de las escuelas y las caracteristicas por edades de los alumnos, es preciso acondicionar mejor las salas de estudio de las asignaturas y las de entrenamiento y asegurar la eficiencia real de la base material y tecnica de educacion ya preparada. 
					
					Hay que elevar la responsabilidad y el papel de los profesores y empleados de las escuelas para registrar cambio radical en la educacion.
					
					Los profesores y empleados deben atender la vida de los alumnos con el sentimiento paternal para que estos consideren las escuelas como entranables casas natales y nidos de felicidad. Es decir, deben ser padres verdaderos de los alumnos antes de ser sus educadores.
					
					Los alumnos de las escuelas revolucionarias son los hijos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, que viven unidos a esta organizacion con el mismo vaso sanguineo, y los mios.
					
					Ellos deben esforzarse tenazmente por prepararse como pilares de la Corea del Songun teniendo siempre presente la inmensa confianza y benevolencias de los grandes Generalisimos.
					
					Bajo la consigna "!Aprendamos para Corea!" presentada por el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il cuando convivia con los hijos de los martires revolucionarios de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae, deben aprender con asiduo ahorrando el tiempo y formarse como revolucionarios competentes que puedan cumplir papel importante en la lucha por realizar los anhelos de los Generalisimos.
					
					Los graduados de las escuelas deben ser pilares y cumplir el papel de vanguardia en continuar firmemente el linaje de Mangyongdae y el del monte Paektu como los hijos de Mangyongdae crecidos bajo la guia de los 3 Generales del monte Paektu.
					
					Deben desempenar el rol protagonico en apoyar la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun cumpliendo fielmente sus tareas de trabajo.
					
					Al final del mensaje, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un expuso su firme conviccion de que las escuelas revolucionarias formaran magnificamente a los hijos de Mangyongdae como pilares fidedignos, que asumiran en el futuro las responsabilidades del partido, el Estado y el ejercito segun la idea y el proposito del partido, y de que todos los hijos de los martires revolucionarios seran combatientes vanguardistas que apoyaran con fidelidad la direccion del Songun del partido.

articles.title: Inaugurado en Dandong acto semanal de amistad Corea-China
articles.content:
Inaugurado en Dandong acto semanal de amistad Corea-China
						
Dandong, 12 de octubre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado en la ciudad de Dandong de China el acto semanal de amistad Corea-China.
					En este plazo se efectuaran la exhibicion de mercancias, turismo y bellas artes y artesanias, la funcion artistica y otras actividades.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 12 en un estadio de Dandong la ceremonia inaugural.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicepresidente del Comite de Promocion de Comercio Internacional de China, el subgobernador de la provincia de Liaoning de China y otros funcionarios del partido, el gobierno, la cultura, la economia y el comercio exterior de la provincia y la ciudad, asi como los ciudadanos de Dandong, el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la embajada china y otros representantes diplomaticos de varios paises en Corea.
					
					Participaron por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion para el acto semanal, presidida por el vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Hong Kil Nam, el consul general coreano en Shenyang, Kim Kwang Hun y la presidenta de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China, Choe Un Bok.
					
					En la ceremonia hubo discurso inaugural e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores refirieron que en la ciudad de Dandong, ciudad fronteriza, se inaugura el acto semanal de amistad Corea-China, lo que servira de otro importante motivo en la historia del desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad.
					
					Subrayaron que desarrollar invariablemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea-China, preparadas por los dirigentes de veterana generacion y que superaron todas las pruebas de la historias, es la firme posicion de los partidos y los gobiernos de ambos paises.
					
					Dijeron que el presente acto contribuira a estrechar el entendimiento mutuo y la confianza y elevar a una nueva etapa mas alta las relaciones de amistad, cooperacion e intercambio entre las regiones fronteras de ambos paises.
					
					El mismo dia, hubo la funcion artistica del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae y un banquete en honor del acto semanal.

articles.title: Conjunto Artistico Mansudae ofrece funcion artistica en Dandong
articles.content:
Conjunto Artistico Mansudae ofrece funcion artistica en Dandong
						
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Se ofrecio los dias 12 y 13 en un estadio de Dandong la funcion artistica del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae dedicada a la semana de amistad Corea-China.
					La disfrutaron el vicepresidente del Comite de Promocion de Comercio Internacional de China, el subgobernador de la provincia de Liaoning de China y otros funcionarios de la provincia y la ciudad, las personalidades y los ciudadanos de Dandong, el embajador Liu Hongcai y otros miembros de la embajada china y otros representantes diplomaticos de varios paises en Corea.
					
					Presenciaron tambien los miembros de la delegacion para el acto semanal, presidida por el vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Hong Kil Nam, el consul general coreano en Shenyang, Kim Kwang Hun y la presidenta de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China, Choe Un Bok.
					
					En la escena iniciada con el coro "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung", inmortal himno revolucionario, se pusieron el quinteto femenino y coro "Moranbong", el baile "Azalea de la patria", la armonia de violin "El General utiliza el metodo de acortar las distancias" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron excelentemente el ferviente patriotismo del pueblo coreano y la infinita veneracion a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y     Kim Jong Il, quienes contribuyeron grandemente a la revolucion coreana y al cumplimiento de la causa de la independencia en el mundo y prepararon e intensificaron sin cesar las relaciones de amistad Corea-China.
					
					Tambien se presentaron las canciones chinas y las musicas instrumentales incluyendo el solo femenino "Flamea la bandera roja", el quinteto femenino con tema musical de la telenovela china "Mao Anying", el conjunto instrumental femenino "Hace viento de norte".
					
					Fue entregado a los ejecutantes un cesto de flores para felicitar el exitos de la funcion.

articles.title: Acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur por reunificacion de Corea
articles.content:
Acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur por reunificacion de Corea
						
Monte Kumgang, 13 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el Templo Singye del monte Kumgang el acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur para rezar la reunificacion de la patria con motivo del V aniversario de la reconstruccion del Templo Singye del monte Kumgang.
					En la ocasion participaron los clerigos del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea, los monjes y los creyentes del citado templo, por la parte norcoreana y por la surcoreana, los monjes y creyentes de la Orden Budista Jogye.
					
					Hubo ceremonia budista e intervenciones y se dio lectura a la oracion conjunta de budistas intercoreanos para rezar la reunificacion de Corea.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que el templo Singye, reconstruido magnificamente con la fuerza unida de los budistas del Norte y el Sur, no cumple su papel merecido debido a las maniobras obstructoras de las fuerzas conservadoras anti-reunificacion que no agradan el deseo de los connacionales dirigido a la unidad nacional, la reunificacion y al monte Kumgang. 
					
					Llamaron a todos los budistas de ambas partes a unirse con el alma Dharma para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas e implementar las declaraciones N-S y a convertir el templo Singye en el centro de la reconciliacion nacional donde se llena la doctrina budista.
					
					La oracion conjunta manifiesta la determinacion de los budistas de eliminar la desconfianza, la confrontacion entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y el peligro de guerra en acato a la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de junio y la declaracion del 4 de octubre y de movilizarse en la accion practica para asegurar la paz duradera.
